body_html:
@tatianashp Yes, this was implemented about a month ago:

The graph pass is here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/grappler/optimizers/memory_optimizer.cc#L1226

And the code using the result here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/kernels/assign_op.h#L58

The graph pass is here:
